startup_summary.name: FitAI Millennial
startup_summary.idea: AI-powered fitness app targeting millennials with personalized workout plans and real-time progress tracking.
startup_summary.unique_value_proposition: Hyper-personalized workout programs adapting weekly based on user feedback and performance data, AI-driven form correction, and social sharing features.

revenue_streams: In-app purchases for specialized training modules
business_model.pricing_strategy: Freemium model with tiered subscription for advanced features and one-time purchases for specialized content.
business_model.monetization_strategy: Recurring revenue from subscriptions and on-demand revenue from module purchases.

key_differentiators: Hyper-personalization based on user feedback and performance
AI-driven form correction during video sessions
Live group classes with real-time leaderboard and social feed
Personalized video check-ins via AI coach
Social sharing with achievements and milestones

next_steps: Discuss integration timelines for Apple Watch and Fitbit APIs
Implement smart goal based push notifications
